channel.title: Kindle on Often Bearing Metaphoric Tense

item.title: 2014: the year in books, using Goodreads, pandas & Hy
item.description: Note: The content has been updated to reflect the new kwargs style in Hy, as such the snippets only work with the current Hy master As 2014 is coming to a close, I thought it would be a nice time to review the year as far as reading was concerned. Since I track the books I read using Goodreads, I felt it would be an interesting experiment to see some numbers from Goodreads.
